# hw_chairs (Resource)

Comfortable seating that complements your tables, demonstrating style-based pricing and quantity management. Learn how different resource attributes affect cost while ensuring your customers have a pleasant dining experience.

*Seats await guests,*
*Comfort in every style,*
*Rest for weary feet.*



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `quantity` (Number) Number of chairs
- `style` (String) Style of chairs (basic=$20/chair, comfortable=$35/chair, premium=$50/chair)

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the chairs

### Read-Only

- `cost` (Number) Total cost in dollars
- `id` (String) Chairs identifier
